//: The wandering trader may sell the Runelic alphabet banner pattern to players.
These options configure the properties of that trade entry.

enabled.//: Determines if the trade should be registered or not.

currency_item.//: The ID of the item used to buy this trade.

cost.//: The amount of the currency item required.

//: The amount of times the trade can be performed before the villager needs to
Determines if the trade should be registered to the rare pool or the common

craftable_banner_pattern.//: Determines if the runelic banner pattern recipe should be craftable.
